  2. AI Is Nothing Like a Brain, and That’s OK  Quanta Magazine
  3. Humans think — AI, not so much. Science explains why our brains aren't just fancy computers  Salon.com

item.title: IBM Granite 4.0 Tiny Preview: A sneak peek at the next generation of Granite models - IBM
item.description:
1. IBM Granite 4.0 Tiny Preview: A sneak peek at the next generation of Granite models  IBM

  3. IBM AI Releases Granite 4.0 Tiny Preview: A Compact Open-Language Model Optimized for Long-Context and Instruction Tasks  MarkTechPost
